about_me.img_description: Editor's note: This is not me; I am the editor
about_me.paragraph1_1: Full Stack Developer based in La Paz, Mexico. I am about to graduate in my career as a Software Development Engineer at the Autonomous University of Baja California Sur
about_me.paragraph1_2: maintaining an average of 92 out of 100
about_me.paragraph2_1: Over time, I discovered without a doubt that
about_me.paragraph2_3: I love creating things that are as useful as they are cool. I aspire to demonstrate through my efforts that software is not just structured and mechanical logic; it's not just a tool, but has the potential to become something superior, fascinating, expressive, and revolutionary. Software architecture is an art
about_me.paragraph3_2: I'm working on independent projects aimed at helping people learn how to program
about_me.paragraph3_3: . I'm excited to see how these projects positively impact the lives of others
